title: Studio Apartment with Access to Large Pool & Clubhouse
map_address: 5292 S Maryland Pkwy near Tropicana Ave.
posting_body: ['Dorm style!!!', 'Quail Ridge', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x257', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'Comfort, Location, and Convenience', 'True comfort awaits you in one of these charming studio apartments at Quail Ridge.', 'Step into your studio and take note of the stylish finishes.', 'Built-in shelving adorns the walls, making it easy to decorate with your personal items.', 'Spacious closets offer ample storage for your wardrobe while a private bath with a shower ensures your privacy.', 'Enjoy your ideal temperature with individual climate controls or opt for fresh air on the patio or balcony.', 'Additionally, the community offers its own set of inspired amenities, including a pool, business center, and scenic courtyard with expert gardening.', 'Take comfort in the convenience of a laundry facility, on-site management, and package receiving.', 'The University of Nevada is located just a mile away, as are other popular destinations.', 'Call today to speak to a leasing agent.', 'Property Amenities:', '* Pool', '* Laundry', '* Clubhouse', '* Business Center', '* Short-Term Lease', '* Package Receiving', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', '* Picnic Area with BBQ Grills', '* Transportation', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x257', 'Quail Ridge', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '5292 S Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, NV 89119', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
